description:
Scan a document and get a clean PDF you can save or share instantly

FairScan is a document scanner designed to be truly simple and respectful. With FairScan, it takes only a few seconds to get a clean PDF you can share or save.

  • Easy process: scan → preview → save/share
  • Clear, distraction-free interface
  • Live automatic document detection
  • Automatic crop, perspective correction, and enhancement
  • Export to shareable PDFs

FairScan works entirely offline.

Minimal permissions required:

  • Camera
  • On Android 9 and below: storage (to save PDFs to Downloads)
